SEARCH
Module com.example.rupizzeria
Package com.example.rupizzeria

Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
com.example.rupizzeria.Pizza
Direct Known Subclasses:
BBQChicken, BuildYourOwn, Deluxe, Meatzza
public abstract class Pizza extends Object
Abstract base class for representing a pizza. This class defines the common properties for all pizzas, including toppings, crust, and size. Subclasses like Deluxe, BBQChicken, Meatzza, and BuildYourOwn extend this class.
Since:
2024-11-17
Author:
Pranav Chundi
